MARA CEO Recommends 'Invest-And-Forget' Strategy For Retail Bitcoin Investors

Fred Thiel, CEO of the crypto miner MARA Holdings, advised retail investors to adopt an "invest-and-forget" strategy for Bitcoin, recommending they invest small amounts monthly and hold long-term.
